title: You Drive Me Crazy
description: What girl doesn’t dream of an amazing promotion working on the other side of the world?This once in a lifetime opportunity is presented to 28 year old investment banker, Maddison Johnson and instantly fills her with abject fear.It isn't the New York transfer she had set her heart on... she's going to South Korea instead.To make things worse, her boss Mark Kim doesn’t go out of his way to make it easy for her to adapt to her new environment.Plunged into a world she knows nothing about with a man she can't stand, Maddison finds herself forced to adapt and grow up quickly. Maybe in the process she will stumble over something wonderful and quite unexpected...
author: Anna Premoli
